data.name: Magical Valkyrie Lyristia
data.detailed_description:
Latest Release

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1419750/Apostle_Rebellion/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1342120/Castaway_of_the_Ardusta_Sea/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1989450/Public_Defense_Corp_The_Ambassador_of_Peace/


Upcoming Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1724320/Noelle_Does_Her_Best/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1198850/How_to_Build_a_Magnificent_Kingdom/


About the Game






The evil organization Fakker has been terrorizing the residents of the city at night, abducting people left and right.

One woman stands against them: Magical Valkyrie Frostia, a transforming hero who takes down any villains who stand against her.

One day, she saves another woman with the potential to transform and fight alongside her.

Will her new friend be able to transform into Magical Valkyrie Lyristia and stop Fakker's misdeeds for good?

Features:

  • Classic RPG Experience
  • Turn-based combat
  • Leveling System
  • Skill System
  • Contemporary Setting

data.short_description: The evil organization Fakker has been terrorizing the residents of the city at night, abducting people left and right. One woman stands against them: Magical Valkyrie Frostia. One day, she saves another woman with the potential to transform and their fate may be changed forever...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

content_descriptors.notes: Magical Valkyrie Lyristia contains strong language.
